meanings.definition: The top surface of a workbench.
meanings.sent1: The benchtop was covered in tools and sawdust.
meanings.sent2: I placed my tools on the sturdy benchtop in the garage.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat decided to nap on the benchtop, leaving paw prints everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cluttered benchtop, filled with unfinished projects and scattered ideas.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight gleamed on the smooth benchtop, highlighting its worn edges.

meanings.definition: A small, portable work surface typically used in kitchens or laboratories.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen benchtop was perfect for rolling out dough for cookies.
meanings.sent2: She carried the lab benchtop to the experiment table carefully.
meanings.sent3: The tiny benchtop seemed to have a mind of its own, always rolling away when not held down.
meanings.sent4: His creativity soared as he worked on the portable benchtop, feeling free to move around.
meanings.sent5: The red benchtop added a pop of color to the sterile laboratory, brightening the room.
